item.title: Black安装和使用
item.description: Black是一个毫不妥协的python代码格式化工具, 特点是可配置项较少 Black依赖于python3.6+, 官方地址在https://github.com/psf/black Install pip install black Configure pyproject.toml [tool.black] skip-string-normalization = true # 禁用双引号风格 pycharm Create external tools windows: File -> Settings -> Tools -> External Tools Configure file watcher
